title: Ultra-conservative José Antonio Kast elected Chile’s next president | Chile | The Guardian
snippet: The ultra-conservative former congressman José Antonio Kast has been elected as Chile’s next president.

title: Kast’s Victory in Chile Is Another Win for Global Right-Wing Movement - The New York Times
snippet: Kast was elected as Chile’s president on his third try, scoring a resounding victory against his leftist opponent and pushing the country decidedly to the right as Chileans sought iron-fisted solutions to increased violence and illegal immigration. Mr. Kast, a stern father of nine with deep ideological roots in conservative Catholicism and economic neoliberalism, belongs to a global right-wing movement that has risen to power around the world by prioritizing strict law and order and sealing borders.

title: Chile's New Rightwing President Jose Antonio Kast Makes Liberty Advance Over Socialism in Latin America | The Gateway Pundit | by Paul Serran
snippet: Pro-life, pro-family Catholic politician José Antonio Kast, a father of nine, has won Chile’s presidential election, defeating his communist rival. pic.twitter.com/ADiYQYn2Te · — Sachin Jose (@Sachinettiyil) December 14, 2025

title: Chile elects Kast as president in sharp rightward shift | Reuters
snippet: [1/3]Jose Antonio Kast, presidential ... to their supporters as they celebrate after Kast won Chile's presidency in a presidential runoff election, in Santiago, Chile, December 14, 2025....

title: Far-right José Antonio Kast wins Chile's presidential vote | AP News
snippet: Presidential candidate Jose Antonio Kast, of the opposition Republican Party, and his wife Maria Pia Adriasola wave to supporters after winning the presidential runoff election in Santiago, Chile, Sunday, Dec. 14, 2025.
